jobDescription: REQUESTS FOR PROPOSALDATA SCIENTIST (DSCA)COMPETITIVE INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR OPPPORTUNITYA. Objective and Scope of EngagementTufts Medical Center (Tufts MC) and the Clinical and Translational Sciences Institute (CTSI) seek a Data Scientist (DSCA) for a new scientific software development initiative. The DSCA will assess, recommend and document a range of computational issues and methods in support of causal analysis and modeling.B. Actionable methodologies for informing clinical, biological and biochemical computational workflows.D.
